name: DUNkrsh
description:
You wandered into a shop and broke the keeper's expensive vase! He gives you a deal though, to eliminate the pests down in his basement to pay back the debt. Take out entire waves of enemies and make sure to protect your light source! You're gonna need it!

submitted to the #MyFirstGameJam and made in 2 weeks.

Arrow Keys to move
Z to shoot
Hold Z to strafe shoot
Enter to confirm upgrades or enter the menu

1.1 has been uploaded, gamepad is now supported.
